hero.title: We Engineer Intelligent AI Agents for Your Business.
hero.description: Aucess specializes in building custom Agentic AI that integrates directly into your website and other social media platforms and automate your business. We don't just answer questions; we automate bookings, sales, and support.

features.subtitle: Aucess ai chatbot Features
features.title: Build the perfect customer-facing AI agent
features.button: build your ai chatbot - it's free

chatbot.title: Automate with smart chatbot
chatbot.description: Handle customer queries instantly, reduce repetitive manual tasks, and boost customer satisfaction with our 24/7 AI-powered chatbot automation designed to streamline your support.

realtime.title: Sync with real-time data
realtime.description: Make faster, data-driven decisions powered by real-time AI analysis and prediction.

multilingual.title: Multilingual support
multilingual.description: Multilingual support lets you connect with customers worldwide by removing language.

reporting.title: Advanced reporting
reporting.description: Advanced reporting provides detailed insights and data to help you make smarter.

privacy.title: Data privacy & security
privacy.description: Data privacy & security protect your information, ensuring it stays safe all times.

somchai.content: "Aucess now automates over 70% of our customer queries, saving hours of manual work daily. It's improved both our response time and overall customer satisfaction."
somchai.author: Somchai Srivat

bernard.content: "Building our SaaS application for GreenInfina was seamless with Aucess. The automation capabilities have completely transformed how our agency operates."
bernard.author: Bernard

bruno.content: "Aucess's powerful analytics give us deep insights into customer needs. We've optimized our chatbot flows and seen noticeable growth in conversions."
bruno.author: Bruno Safille

process.subtitle: HOW IT WORKS
process.title: From Raw Data to Autonomous Agent

integrations.subtitle: SEAMLESS ECOSYSTEM INTEGRATION
integrations.title: Your AI agent doesn't live in a silo.
integrations.description: We engineer custom API bridges to sync real-time data between your chatbot and your existing software stack.

inventory.title: Live Inventory & Booking Sync
inventory.context: We connect to WooCommerce, Shopify, or your Hotel Calendar to prevent double-bookings.

omnichannel.title: Omnichannel Deployment
omnichannel.context: One brain, everywhere. Deploy the same agent on your Website, WhatsApp, and Instagram.

crm.title: CRM & Lead Automation
crm.context: Push leads directly into HubSpot, Salesforce, or Google Sheets the moment they chat.

payment.title: Payment Gateways
payment.context: Process secure transactions via Stripe or PayPal directly inside the chat window.

without.dropoff: High Drop-off Rate: Customers leave if they wait more than 60 seconds.
without.hours: Limited Hours: You miss bookings/sales outside of 9-5 business hours.
without.language: Language Barriers: Losing international tourists due to poor translation.
without.passive: Passive Support: Staff waits for customers to ask questions.
without.error: Human Error: Staff forgets to update the calendar or send confirmation emails.

with.instant: Instant Response: 0-second latency, capturing leads the moment they show interest.
with.revenue: 24/7 Revenue: The agent processes bookings and payments while you sleep.
with.fluency: Native Fluency: Speaks Italian, German, & English perfectly (No "Google Translate" feel).
with.proactive: Proactive Selling: The AI suggests upgrades, rooms, and products automatically.
with.integration: Direct Integration: Syncs perfectly with your Database/CRM in real-time.

q1.question: Do I need a lot of data to train the Al chatbot?
q1.answer: You don't need much to start. Just provide your website URL, and our tool will automatically scrape and train your AI chatbot. Even with limited data, you can collect customer questions and keep improving the bot. The more data you provide, the smarter and more effective it becomes.
points: Instant Setup – Add your URL, and the chatbot trains itself.
Self-Learning – Learns from real customer questions.
Smarter with Data – More data means better answers.
